name: astonish
effect: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 30% chance to make the target flinch.
short_effect: Has a 30% chance to make the target flinch.

flavor_text.ruby-sapphire: An attack that may shock the foe into flinching.
flavor_text.emerald: An attack that may shock the foe into flinching.
flavor_text.firered-leafgreen: An attack using a startling shout. It also may make the foe flinch.
